#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	//freopen("cook.txt","r",stdin);
	long long int t,c,n,i,d[50004],su;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			scanf("%lld",(d+i));
		}
		sort(d,d+n);
		su=1;
		c=0;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			if(i!=0&&(i%6)==0)
			++su;
			if(d[i]<su)
			{
				break;
			}
			++c;
			++su;
		}
		if(c==n)
		printf("Bhai Ho!\n");
		else
		printf("Killed %lld\n",c);
	}
	return 0;
}
